resources.string: This is not a correct word! Maybe try letters instead?
There is no such letter in this word!
Enter a letter or a word
You have to enter a letter or a word in order to guess!

Rules of the game are easy. You read the description, you see how many letters are there (masked with (*)) and you guess what could that word be. You are free to enter either the whole word or only one letter. This is a sample android app created by me, Erl_ (known to the outside as Roman Popesku). For sources and more information please visit https://github.com/Erlkonigin/Guessaword
